DataElement.preferredName: Person Hispanic or Latino OMOP CDM Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).:A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin, regardless of race. The term, "Spanish origin" can be used in addition to "Hispanic or Latino". (OMB):A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin, regardless of race. The term, "Spanish origin" can be used in addition to "Hispanic or Latino". (OMB)_A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person of Mexican, Puerto Rican, Cuban, Central or South American or other Spanish culture or origin, regardless of race. An arbitrary ethnic classification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.
